bike.description: Fully independent cross-country suspension at a hardtail weight. ZR 9000 Alloy™ delivers exceptional speed and durability.

components.description: RockShox Duke XC hydra air, HC2 damping, 30mm upper tubes, external rebound adjust, 80mm travel

Bontrager Select: Durable welded rims, machined for smooth braking; OSB rear rim provides good stiffness for any size rider; Hi-Lo ATB rear hub design w/excellent spoke bracing angles for improved lateral wheel rigidity; Cro-Moly skewers; 780 g, 24h front
AHS 1-1/8" alloy cups, semi cartridge, sealed
